name: Wasteland Kings
description:
THIS PROTOTYPE IS BEING OFFERED WITHOUT ANY SUPPORT, WILL NOT WORK ON WINDOWS 8. THIS DOWNLOAD DOES NOT ENTITLE PEOPLE TO THE FULL RELEASE, NUCLEAR THRONE OR ANY UPDATES THEREOF, IT'S JUST HERE SO THAT PEOPLE CAN PLAY THE ORIGINAL TO COMPARE IT TO NUCLEAR THRONE.

What is Wasteland Kings? Wasteland Kings was the prototype that Vlambeer created for the three day MOJAM charity build. They liked it enough to continue with the project under the name 'Nuclear Throne'.

What is Nuclear Throne? Nuclear Throne is Vlambeers latest action roguelike-like about mutants that spend their workdays trying to fight for the throne in a post-apocalyptic world. The radioactive waste in the world allows mutants to get ahead by mutating new limbs on the fly and the abundant availability of powerful weaponry makes the quest to become the ruler of the Wasteland one frought with peril. All of this is really just an excuse for us to make a fun action game.

You can buy Nuclear Throne at www.nuclearthrone.com.
